PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-03402022-04-05,  ,  ,  ,  FIN
ActBretton Woods and Related Agreements Act
SubjectOrder Authorizing the Minister of Finance to Provide Bilateral Financial Assistance to Ukraine
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Finance to provide BILATERAL FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE TO UKRAINE up to $1 billion dollars, in order to help Ukraine stabilize its economy, for a period ending on March 31, 2026, or sooner if the requirements set out under the BRETTON WOODS AND RELATED AGREEMENTS ACT are no longer satisfied.
AttachmentsAttachment
